text: Emilie Goldblum (née Livingston, born January 4, 1983) is a Canadian dancer, aerialist and contortionist, and retired Olympic rhythmic gymnast. ==Career== At the age of 10, she moved to Russia (to Novogorsk near Moscow) to train with Russian rhythmic gymnasts and Russian coaches, such as Irina Viner and Lusi Dimitrova. Livingston is a three-time national champion of Canada in rhythmic gymnastics. She represented Canada at the 1999 Pan American Games in Winnipeg, Manitoba, winning the gold medal as in the individual all-around. She also represented Canada at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia, placing 18th in the individual all-around competition. In 2000, she competed at 167 cm and 38 kg. In the film Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets, Livingston was a body double for Rihanna performing Bubble’s pole dance scene. She was also a body double for Emma Stone's aerial work in the film La La Land. == Personal life == Livingston married American actor Jeff Goldblum on November 8, 2014. Their first son, Charlie Ocean, was born on July 4, 2015, and second son, River Joe, was born April 7, 2017. == Competitive history == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;" |- !
